data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Fejér, Hungary.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Fejér, Hungary
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Fejér prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 32 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Fejér, Hungary.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Fejér do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Arab, general people. 0.5% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, encourage the church of Fejér, Hungary that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Fejér, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.section_summary:
the state of Fejér, Hungary has a population of 428,700.

We estimate Fejér has 13,098 people who might know Jesus, 360,017 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 55,585 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 32 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Fejér
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

location.name: Fejér
